post.author: 고상호
post.content:
Hello Brad
Here is the new job description. Please let me know if you have any friends or relatives that would like to pursue this opportunity.
DURATION: 6 months
POSITION SUMMARY:
The J2EE Programmer is required to develop a web-based application on Websphere platform. The programmer is responsible for creating JSP, servlet, EJB, UDB stored procedures, JDBC and JMS interfaces to the database server and back end host systems on Unix and Mainframe.
MINIMUM SKILLS, KNOWLEDGE AND EXPERIENCE REQUIRED: ?Must have 3+ years experience in web development, OOP, Java, JSP, Custom Tag Library, Servlet, EJB, JAXP, JMS, JDBC using Websphere 5 and IBM UDB Server 7.2. ?Must have knowledge of object oriented system analysis and design. ?Must have knowledge of UML, OO design patterns such as MVC, Service Locator and tools such as JConfig, JMX and ANT. ?Must have proficiency in all aspects of programming and analysis, including design and factors, hardware and software requirements, systems facilities and execution protocols ?Excellent interpersonal, analytical and problem solving skills ?Strong communication skills and the ability to work in a team environment ?Preference will be given to candidates with J2EE Certification
Regards Ben Pozin Emex Systems (416)494 4466 Ext 231.
post.title: The J2EE Programmer
